title: BRIEF-Ftse Russell Says Based on Indicative Review Marks & Spencer Likely To Be Removed From FTSE 100
text:
BRIEF-Ftse Russell Says Based on Indicative Review Marks & Spencer Likely To Be Removed From FTSE 100

Stock Markets 7 hours ago (Sep 02, 2019 19:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Ftse Russell Says Based on Indicative Review Marks & Spencer Likely To Be Removed From FTSE 100 Sept 2 (Reuters) - * ADDITIONS BASED ON FRIDAY CLOSE: HIKMA PHARMA , MEGGITT , POLYMETAL - RUSSELL * DELETIONS BASED ON FRIDAY CLOSE: DIRECT LINE , MARKS & SPENCER , MICRO FOCUS - FTSE RUSSELL * FTSE RUSSELL SAYS ACTUAL REVIEW OF FTSE UK INDEX SERIES WILL BE CONDUCTED USING DATA AS AT MARKET CLOSE ON TUESDAY 3 SEPTEMBER Further company coverage: .FTSE
